CatDescriptText: Cutline of related image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper March 31, 1945, pg. 26, reads: "Baby Contestants - Participants in the baby contest sponsored by Unit No. 3 of the Association of Kay Women's Auxiliaries at the Kay Boys Club last Friday evening. Babies Jeanette Meyers, Donna Youngblood and Lorene Amos captured first, second and third prizes, respectively. Mrs. Margaret Lampkin, president of the unit, presented a $25 War Bond to the first price winner. Sitting, left to right: Ann Sales, Reginald Rose Jr., Eleanor Valentine, Lorena Amos, Rena Tames, Connie Mathis, Louis McTurner Jr., and Antoinette McTurner. Standing: Mrs. Reginald Rose, Mrs. Manford Sales, Linda Lee Sales, Mrs. Edward Amos, Mrs. Leola Jones, Jeannette Jones, Mrs. Gerald Tames, Gerald Tames and Mrs. Louis McTurner. Not shown in picture, Jeannette Meyers and Donna Youngblood. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Participants in baby contests, including seated from left: Ann Sales, Reginald Rose Jr., Eleanor Valentine, Lorena Amos, Rena Tames, Connie Mathis, Louis McTurner Jr., Antoinette McTurner; standing: Mrs. Reginald Rose, Mrs. Manford Sales, Linda Lee Sales, Mrs. Edward Amos, Mrs. Leola Jones, Jeannette Jones, Mrs. Gerald Tames, Gerald Tames and Mrs. Louis McTurner in Kay Boys Club
